title: Community Ambassadors Performance Dashboard
description: Comprehensive ambassador analytics with cross-platform engagement tracking, performance metrics, and actionable insights

targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_ambassadors FROM community_ambassadors;

SELECT 
  COUNT(*) AS discord_posts,
  COUNT(DISTINCT dm.author_id) AS active_ambassadors,
  ROUND(COUNT(*)::numeric / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT dm.author_id), 0), 1) AS avg_posts_per_ambassador
FROM discord_messages dm 
JOIN community_ambassadors ca ON dm.author_id::bigint = ca.discord_id 
WHERE dm.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND dm.created_at <= $__timeTo() 
AND dm.author_is_bot = false;

SELECT 
  COUNT(*) AS telegram_posts,
  COUNT(DISTINCT tm.from_user_id) AS active_ambassadors,
  ROUND(COUNT(*)::numeric / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT tm.from_user_id), 0), 1) AS avg_posts_per_ambassador
FROM telegram_messages tm 
JOIN community_ambassadors ca ON tm.from_user_id = ca.telegram_id 
WHERE tm.date >= $__timeFrom() AND tm.date <= $__timeTo();

SELECT 
  COUNT(DISTINCT dm.id) AS x_posts,
  COUNT(DISTINCT ca.ambassador) AS active_ambassadors,
  ROUND(COUNT(DISTINCT dm.id)::numeric / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT ca.ambassador), 0), 1) AS avg_posts_per_ambassador
FROM discord_messages dm 
CROSS JOIN community_ambassadors ca 
WHERE dm.channel_id = '1248750328896295084' 
AND dm.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND dm.created_at <= $__timeTo() 
AND dm.author_is_bot = false 
AND dm.content ILIKE '%' || ca.x_handle || '%';

WITH ambassador_daily_activity AS (
  SELECT 
    ca.ambassador,
    DATE(dm.created_at) as activity_date,
    COUNT(dm.id) as discord_messages,
    COUNT(DISTINCT dm.channel_id) as channels_used,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN dm.mentions != '{}' THEN 1 END) as mentions_given,
    -- Calculate daily engagement score
    ROUND(
      (COUNT(dm.id) * 1.0 + 
       COUNT(DISTINCT dm.channel_id) * 2.0 + 
       COUNT(CASE WHEN dm.mentions != '{}' THEN 1 END) * 1.5), 2
    ) as daily_engagement_score
  FROM community_ambassadors ca
  LEFT JOIN discord_messages dm ON dm.author_id::text = ca.discord_id::text
    AND dm.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND dm.created_at <= $__timeTo() 
    AND dm.author_is_bot = false
  GROUP BY ca.ambassador, DATE(dm.created_at)
  HAVING COUNT(dm.id) > 0
)
SELECT 
  activity_date as time,
  ambassador as metric,
  daily_engagement_score as value
FROM ambassador_daily_activity
ORDER BY time, ambassador;

WITH ambassador_performance AS (
  SELECT 
    ca.ambassador,
    ca.role,
    ca.discord_id,
    ca.telegram_id,
    ca.x_handle,
    -- Discord activity metrics
    COUNT(dm.id) as discord_messages,
    COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(dm.created_at)) as discord_active_days,
    COUNT(DISTINCT dm.channel_id) as discord_channels_used,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN dm.mentions != '{}' THEN 1 END) as discord_mentions_given,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN dm.attachments != '{}' THEN 1 END) as discord_attachments_shared,
    -- Telegram activity metrics
    COUNT(tm.message_id) as telegram_messages,
    COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(tm.date)) as telegram_active_days,
    -- Calculate average message length for quality indicator
    ROUND(AVG(LENGTH(dm.content)), 0) as avg_message_length,
    -- Cross-platform consistency score
    CASE 
      WHEN COUNT(dm.id) > 0 AND COUNT(tm.message_id) > 0 THEN 'Multi-Platform'
      WHEN COUNT(dm.id) > 0 THEN 'Discord Only'
      WHEN COUNT(tm.message_id) > 0 THEN 'Telegram Only'
      ELSE 'Inactive'
    END as platform_presence,
    -- Enhanced engagement score with quality factors
    ROUND(
      (COUNT(dm.id) * 1.0 + 
       COUNT(tm.message_id) * 1.5 + 
       COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(dm.created_at)) * 3.0 + 
       COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(tm.date)) * 4.0 + 
       COUNT(DISTINCT dm.channel_id) * 2.0 + 
       COUNT(CASE WHEN dm.mentions != '{}' THEN 1 END) * 1.5 +
       COUNT(CASE WHEN dm.attachments != '{}' THEN 1 END) * 1.2 +
       (AVG(LENGTH(dm.content)) / 100.0) * 0.5), 2
    ) as activity_score
  FROM community_ambassadors ca
  LEFT JOIN discord_messages dm ON dm.author_id::text = ca.discord_id::text
    AND dm.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND dm.created_at <= $__timeTo() 
    AND dm.author_is_bot = false
  LEFT JOIN telegram_messages tm ON tm.from_user_id::text = ca.telegram_id::text
    AND tm.date >= $__timeFrom() AND tm.date <= $__timeTo()
  GROUP BY ca.ambassador, ca.role, ca.discord_id, ca.telegram_id, ca.x_handle
),
performance_rankings AS (
  SELECT *,
    RANK() OVER (ORDER BY activity_score DESC) as performance_rank,
    CASE 
      WHEN RANK() OVER (ORDER BY activity_score DESC) <= 3 THEN 'Elite'
      WHEN RANK() OVER (ORDER BY activity_score DESC) <= 8 THEN 'Excellent'
      WHEN RANK() OVER (ORDER BY activity_score DESC) <= 15 THEN 'Good'
      WHEN RANK() OVER (ORDER BY activity_score DESC) <= 25 THEN 'Average'
      ELSE 'Needs Support'
    END as performance_tier,
    NTILE(10) OVER (ORDER BY activity_score DESC) as performance_decile,
    -- Calculate engagement rate per active day
    ROUND(activity_score / NULLIF(GREATEST(discord_active_days, telegram_active_days), 0), 2) as daily_engagement_rate
  FROM ambassador_performance
)
SELECT 
  ambassador as "Ambassador",
  role as "Role",
  discord_messages as "Discord Posts",
  telegram_messages as "Telegram Posts",
  discord_active_days as "Discord Days",
  telegram_active_days as "Telegram Days",
  discord_channels_used as "Channels",
  discord_mentions_given as "Mentions",
  discord_attachments_shared as "Attachments",
  avg_message_length as "Avg Msg Length",
  platform_presence as "Platform Presence",
  activity_score as "Activity Score",
  daily_engagement_rate as "Daily Rate",
  performance_rank as "Rank",
  performance_tier as "Tier",
  performance_decile as "Decile"
FROM performance_rankings
ORDER BY activity_score DESC;

SELECT 
  'Discord' as platform, 
  COUNT(dm.id) as posts,
  COUNT(DISTINCT dm.author_id) as active_ambassadors,
  ROUND(AVG(LENGTH(dm.content)), 0) as avg_message_length
FROM discord_messages dm 
JOIN community_ambassadors ca ON dm.author_id::bigint = ca.discord_id 
WHERE dm.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND dm.created_at <= $__timeTo() 
AND dm.author_is_bot = false
UNION ALL 
SELECT 
  'Telegram' as platform, 
  COUNT(tm.message_id) as posts,
  COUNT(DISTINCT tm.from_user_id) as active_ambassadors,
  ROUND(AVG(LENGTH(tm.text)), 0) as avg_message_length
FROM telegram_messages tm 
JOIN community_ambassadors ca ON tm.from_user_id = ca.telegram_id 
WHERE tm.date >= $__timeFrom() AND tm.date <= $__timeTo()
UNION ALL 
SELECT 
  'X/Twitter' as platform, 
  COUNT(DISTINCT dm.id) as posts,
  COUNT(DISTINCT ca.ambassador) as active_ambassadors,
  ROUND(AVG(LENGTH(dm.content)), 0) as avg_message_length
FROM discord_messages dm 
CROSS JOIN community_ambassadors ca 
WHERE dm.channel_id = '1248750328896295084' 
AND dm.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND dm.created_at <= $__timeTo() 
AND dm.author_is_bot = false 
AND dm.content ILIKE '%' || ca.x_handle || '%';

WITH top_performers AS (
  SELECT 
    ca.ambassador,
    COUNT(dm.id) + COUNT(tm.message_id) as total_posts,
    COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(dm.created_at)) + COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(tm.date)) as total_active_days,
    ROUND(
      (COUNT(dm.id) * 1.0 + 
       COUNT(tm.message_id) * 1.5 + 
       COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(dm.created_at)) * 3.0 + 
       COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(tm.date)) * 4.0), 2
    ) as activity_score
  FROM community_ambassadors ca
  LEFT JOIN discord_messages dm ON dm.author_id::text = ca.discord_id::text
    AND dm.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND dm.created_at <= $__timeTo() 
    AND dm.author_is_bot = false
  LEFT JOIN telegram_messages tm ON tm.from_user_id::text = ca.telegram_id::text
    AND tm.date >= $__timeFrom() AND tm.date <= $__timeTo()
  GROUP BY ca.ambassador
  ORDER BY activity_score DESC
  LIMIT 5
)
SELECT 
  MAX(total_posts) as max_posts,
  MAX(total_active_days) as max_active_days,
  MAX(activity_score) as max_activity_score,
  AVG(activity_score) as avg_top_score
FROM top_performers;

SELECT 
  DATE_TRUNC('day', dm.created_at) as time, 
  'Discord' as metric, 
  COUNT(dm.id) as value 
FROM discord_messages dm 
JOIN community_ambassadors ca ON dm.author_id::bigint = ca.discord_id 
WHERE dm.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND dm.created_at <= $__timeTo() 
AND dm.author_is_bot = false 
GROUP BY time 
UNION ALL 
SELECT 
  DATE_TRUNC('day', tm.date) as time, 
  'Telegram' as metric, 
  COUNT(tm.message_id) as value 
FROM telegram_messages tm 
JOIN community_ambassadors ca ON tm.from_user_id = ca.telegram_id 
WHERE tm.date >= $__timeFrom() AND tm.date <= $__timeTo() 
GROUP BY time 
ORDER BY time;

WITH ambassador_response_times AS (
  SELECT 
    ca.ambassador,
    dm.channel_id,
    dm.created_at,
    LAG(dm.created_at) OVER (PARTITION BY dm.channel_id ORDER BY dm.created_at) as prev_message_time,
    EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (dm.created_at - LAG(dm.created_at) OVER (PARTITION BY dm.channel_id ORDER BY dm.created_at))) / 60 as response_time_minutes
  FROM discord_messages dm
  JOIN community_ambassadors ca ON dm.author_id::text = ca.discord_id::text
  WHERE dm.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND dm.created_at <= $__timeTo()
  AND dm.author_is_bot = false
),
response_categories AS (
  SELECT 
    ambassador,
    CASE 
      WHEN response_time_minutes IS NULL THEN 'First Message'
      WHEN response_time_minutes <= 5 THEN 'Very Fast (<5min)'
      WHEN response_time_minutes <= 30 THEN 'Fast (5-30min)'
      WHEN response_time_minutes <= 120 THEN 'Medium (30min-2h)'
      WHEN response_time_minutes <= 1440 THEN 'Slow (2h-24h)'
      ELSE 'Very Slow (>24h)'
    END as response_category,
    COUNT(*) as message_count
  FROM ambassador_response_times
  GROUP BY ambassador, response_category
)
SELECT 
  ambassador,
  response_category,
  message_count
FROM response_categories
WHERE response_category != 'First Message'
ORDER BY ambassador, 
  CASE response_category
    WHEN 'Very Fast (<5min)' THEN 1
    WHEN 'Fast (5-30min)' THEN 2
    WHEN 'Medium (30min-2h)' THEN 3
    WHEN 'Slow (2h-24h)' THEN 4
    WHEN 'Very Slow (>24h)' THEN 5
  END;

WITH ambassador_quality_metrics AS (
  SELECT 
    ca.ambassador,
    -- Message quality indicators
    COUNT(dm.id) as total_messages,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN dm.mentions != '{}' THEN 1 END) as messages_with_mentions,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN dm.attachments != '{}' THEN 1 END) as messages_with_attachments,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN dm.embeds != '{}' THEN 1 END) as messages_with_embeds,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN LENGTH(dm.content) > 100 THEN 1 END) as long_messages,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN dm.content ILIKE '%?%' THEN 1 END) as questions_asked,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN dm.content ILIKE '%!%' THEN 1 END) as exclamatory_messages,
    AVG(LENGTH(dm.content)) as avg_message_length,
    -- Engagement score calculation
    ROUND(
      (COUNT(CASE WHEN dm.mentions != '{}' THEN 1 END) * 2.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(dm.id), 0) * 100 +
       COUNT(CASE WHEN dm.attachments != '{}' THEN 1 END) * 1.5 / NULLIF(COUNT(dm.id), 0) * 100 +
       COUNT(CASE WHEN LENGTH(dm.content) > 100 THEN 1 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(dm.id), 0) * 100 +
       COUNT(CASE WHEN dm.content ILIKE '%?%' THEN 1 END) * 1.2 / NULLIF(COUNT(dm.id), 0) * 100 +
       (AVG(LENGTH(dm.content)) / 200.0) * 20), 1
    ) as engagement_quality_score
  FROM community_ambassadors ca
  LEFT JOIN discord_messages dm ON dm.author_id::text = ca.discord_id::text
    AND dm.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND dm.created_at <= $__timeTo() 
    AND dm.author_is_bot = false
  GROUP BY ca.ambassador
  HAVING COUNT(dm.id) > 0
)
SELECT 
  ambassador,
  engagement_quality_score
FROM ambassador_quality_metrics
ORDER BY engagement_quality_score DESC;

WITH channel_info AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT 
    dc.channel_id,
    dc.channel_name,
    dc.channel_type
  FROM discord_channels dc
),
ambassador_channel_activity AS (
  SELECT 
    ca.ambassador,
    ci.channel_name,
    ci.channel_type,
    COUNT(dm.id) as message_count,
    COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(dm.created_at)) as active_days
  FROM community_ambassadors ca
  JOIN discord_messages dm ON dm.author_id::text = ca.discord_id::text
  LEFT JOIN channel_info ci ON dm.channel_id = ci.channel_id
  WHERE dm.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND dm.created_at <= $__timeTo()
  AND dm.author_is_bot = false
  GROUP BY ca.ambassador, ci.channel_name, ci.channel_type
  HAVING COUNT(dm.id) > 0
)
SELECT 
  COALESCE(channel_name, 'Unknown Channel') as channel_name,
  ambassador,
  message_count,
  active_days
FROM ambassador_channel_activity
ORDER BY message_count DESC;

WITH weekly_performance AS (
  SELECT 
    ca.ambassador,
    DATE_TRUNC('week', dm.created_at) as week_start,
    COUNT(dm.id) as weekly_messages,
    COUNT(DISTINCT dm.channel_id) as channels_used,
    COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(dm.created_at)) as active_days,
    -- Weekly engagement score
    ROUND(
      (COUNT(dm.id) * 1.0 + 
       COUNT(DISTINCT dm.channel_id) * 2.0 + 
       COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(dm.created_at)) * 3.0), 2
    ) as weekly_engagement_score
  FROM community_ambassadors ca
  LEFT JOIN discord_messages dm ON dm.author_id::text = ca.discord_id::text
    AND dm.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND dm.created_at <= $__timeTo() 
    AND dm.author_is_bot = false
  GROUP BY ca.ambassador, DATE_TRUNC('week', dm.created_at)
  HAVING COUNT(dm.id) > 0
),
top_ambassadors AS (
  SELECT ambassador
  FROM weekly_performance
  GROUP BY ambassador
  ORDER BY AVG(weekly_engagement_score) DESC
  LIMIT 8
)
SELECT 
  wp.week_start as time,
  wp.ambassador as metric,
  wp.weekly_engagement_score as value
FROM weekly_performance wp
JOIN top_ambassadors ta ON wp.ambassador = ta.ambassador
ORDER BY time, ambassador;
